thread.title: BRIEF-Japan's Cryptocurrency Industry Preparing To Establish Self-Regulatory Body - Nikkei‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Japan's Cryptocurrency Industry Preparing To Establish Self-Regulatory Body - Nikkei‍​
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - NIKKEI:
* JAPAN‘S CRYPTOCURRENCY INDUSTRY IS PREPARING TO ESTABLISH A SELF-REGULATORY BODY CONSISTING ONLY OF GOVERNMENT-APPROVED MARKETPLACES - NIKKEI‍​
* TAIZEN OKUYAMA, PRESIDENT OF MONEY PARTNERS GROUP, LIKELY TO BE NEW SELF-REGULATORY BODY‘S CHAIRMAN - NIKKEI‍​
* YUZO KANO EXPECTED TO BE NEW SELF-REGULATORY BODY‘S VICE CHAIRMAN - NIKKEI‍​ Source text :(s.nikkei.com/2EDJ9MI) Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
